text:
="preserve">Manuel Gallardo Lechet (3 May 1935 – 21 August 2020) was a Spanish actor. He was born in Cardena, Spain. His career began in 1961. His best known roles were as Juan in "A Land for All" (1962), Halaf in "100 Horsemen" (1964) and as Fred in "Saturday, Sunday and Friday" (1979).
Gallardo died on 21 August 2020 in Madrid, aged 85.
